content:
this is based on the star stitch gauge doesn t really matter vary yarn and needle size to get the fabric you want the colorway pictured at the top is sun flowers also included is a photo of the reverse side of the scarf a norwegian translation is available at this 1 blog and a french translation is available at this 2 one the name comes from a song by the brunettes holding hands feeding ducks
when i met you that s what i wanted to do 1 http //gratisoppskrifter poppyfield net/ p=47 2 http //misstlog blogspot com/2012/02/fendredi-en-francais-french-friday html
